text: Alan M. Webber (born September 18, 1948) is an American businessman, author, publisher, and politician. He is the 43rd mayor of Santa Fe, New Mexico, since 2018. He ran unsuccessfully for Governor of New Mexico as a member of the Democratic Party during the 2014 primary elections. Webber founded the technology business magazine, Fast Company in 1995. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Santa Fe, New Mexico Category:American publishers Category:Politicians from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Businesspeople from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Writers from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Writers from Santa Fe, New Mexico Category:Businesspeople from Santa Fe, New Mexico Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Alan Webber
